Title: The Invisible Leopard
Plot: There are leopards all over the world. From the slopes of Everest to the forests of China and Russia, leopards survive against the odds. In each habitat, they have adapted to their surroundings, and their predators, devising the best survival strategies, which makes them a surprising success story among the big cats. What is their secret? The Invisible Leopard delves deep into the behaviour of these secretive big cats, analysing the methods they employ when negotiating their habitat, and thereby
